MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH2 postcode areas of Elton and Ince, affecting properties Meadow View, Kinseys Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  08:17AM. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:47AM on 27th April 2021
